title: X Factor – Ben Foden's relationships, from Una Healy to his new wife
text:
Ben was previously married to Una Healy (Picture: Ben Foden/Instagram/GC Images/Mark R. Milan)

Ben Foden got pulses – apparently including Nicole Scherzinger’s – racing last night with his cheeky performance on The X Factor: Celebrity.

Together with fellow rugby stars Thom Evans and Levi Davis, Ben performed No Diggity by Dr Dre, much to the delight of a giddy Nicole.

She commented: ‘These guys are hot, I’m newly single and ready to mingle!’

This may well have been music to Ben’s ears, in the wake of rumours he told an unnamed woman that he’d previously fantasised about a threesome with Nicole.

As we continue to fan ourselves after his performance last night, let’s take a look at his relationship with former Saturdays singer Una Healy, as well as his recent marriage to Jackie Belanoff-Smith, both of whom he has dated since he entered the public eye.

Ben has teamed up with Thom Evans and Levi Davis to compete in Celebrity X Factor (Picture: Dymond/Thames/Syco/REX)

When was Ben Foden married to Una Healy and why did they break up?

Advertisement

Advertisement

Ben and Una married in 2012 after four years of dating.

They have two children, Aoife Belle, aged seven, and four-year-old Tadhg John.

Their marriage broke down in 2018 after 34-year-old Ben admitted sleeping with another woman behind Una’s back – something he later said was the ‘biggest and most stupid mistake’ he could have made.

At the time, Una, 38, admitted the break-up turned her life ‘upside down.’

The couple called it a day in 2018 (Picture: Ben Foden Testimonial/REX/Shutterstock)

Speaking to The Sun this week, Ben said Una helped him improve his singing skills and coached him while they were together.

The rugby star added that he hopes Una will come to see him at the live show, together with their children.

He said: ‘Obviously my kids, I’d love to get them down to the show. I’ll ask Una whether she’ll come or not, and then we’ll see.’

Una has yet to respond publicly.

Who is Ben Foden’s new wife Jackie Belanoff-Smith?

In August, Ben married his current wife, Jackie Belanoff-Smith, after two weeks of dating.

The couple met through a mutual friend, and the rest is (recent) history!

He shared a series of their wedding photos on Instagram together with a caption explaining his quick decision, while clarifying that Una had given ‘her blessing.’

Una gave Ben and Jackie her blessing (Picture: Ben Foden/Instagram)

He wrote: ‘But when someone like her comes in to your life, why would I wait? The people who needed to know, such as close family and friends were told before anyone else and they are happy for me including my beautiful X wife @unahealy who I love even more for her blessing.’

Jackie comes from New York where she runs her own company called The Goddess Line, which specialises in cruelty-free beauty products.

The X Factor: Celebrity continues next Saturday on ITV.
